Apr 19, 2014

Fixing Python UnicodeEncodeErrors

If you ever hit this error when trying to process HTML:

python UnicodeEncodeError: 'ascii' codec can't encode character u'\xa0' in position 7520: ordinal not in range(128)

You can add the following line

python thestring.encode('ascii', 'ignore')
